name: Fire and Ice Slots | Free Slot Machine Games
name_original: Fire and Ice Slots | Free Slot Machine Games
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true gambling functionality.
FIRE AND ICE: EVOLUTION, the scorching hot social version of the hit slot machine played in real casinos, is now available on iOS!

Set out on an extraordinary quest in this free to play ultra slot game themed around two of the most powerful elements in the world! Ignite your reels and freeze an expanding wild to propel you to the moment of your big win in this authentic, fast-paced, fun slot game based off of a real slot machine game played in casinos all over the globe!

Our #1 HOTTEST game… or is it the COOLEST?

FUN FEATURES:
* All the same action and excitement of slot games in a real Las Vegas casinos!
* Fire and Ice Wild Symbols expand to turn whole reels Wild for Big Wins!
* Free Spins with big reward jackpots!
* Free bonus coins every day you play!
* Power up and unlock six exciting slot machines on your epic journey!

This game is for amusement purposes only.
